globalRules.characterReference: Cards may only reference characters that were previously created by a Cast card already in play.
globalRules.relationshipRequirement: Relationship cards require all referenced characters to already exist.
globalRules.threading: Structure cards may create or advance a Thread B (subplot). Thread B can be referenced by later cards and wrapped in Resolution.
globalRules.tagCounting: Any played card with a non-null tag contributes +1 to that Beat Tag count for Pattern requirements.
